PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_TankTypeSectional
PropertySetDef.Definition: Fixed vessel constructed from sectional parts with one or more compartments for storing a liquid.\X\0D \X\0D Note (1): All sectional construction tanks are considered to be rectangular by default.\X\0D Note (2): Generally, it is not expected that sectional construction tanks will be used for the purposes of gas storage.\X\0D \X\0D Pset renamed from Pset_TankTypeSectionalTank to Pset_TankTypeSectional in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfSections
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of sections used in the construction of the tank\X\0D \X\0D Note: All sections assumed to be the same size.

PropertyDef.Name: SectionLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of a section used in the construction of the tank.

PropertyDef.Name: SectionWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The width of a section used in the construction of the tank.
